bullets: Served teams as a Scrum Master for Workday's content management site built with Docker, PHP and MySQL.
Added new features including content audit tools, content archival and community user group operations.
Integrated the site login system with Okta using APIs, providing improved customer experience and security
Delivered new user interfaces built with React for feedback and search.
Wrote and optimized unit tests that reduced bugs and prevented downtime throughout the site.
Built a utility bill calculator capable of predicting long-term customer electricity costs anywhere in the country, resulting in increased customer confidence and decreased risk of legal liability.
Redesigned a monolithic pricing engine to improve solar pricing clarity, adapt to changing product requirements and improve automated test coverage while adhering to rigorous weekly deadlines.
Constructed SQL queries that retrieved customer and reference data that led to efficient object-relational mappings.
Implemented automated tests, Splunk logging, data auditing, input validation and removed outdated dependencies
Diagnosed and resolved issues during live production releases that preserved thousands of dollars of revenue.
Developed a web portal using C# and stored procedures to retrieve customer data from over 20 insurance agencies.
Programmed responsive interfaces that display data structures derived from databases, algorithms, and callbacks.
Designed the front-end of an enterprise web application using the .NET MVC framework and JavaScript.
Constructed interfaces using controls such as grids, graphs, drop-downs, and calendars with agile workflow.
Established a file sharing server for students across campus, resulting in renewed enthusiasm among teachers and staff.
Verified and documented over 40 software errors and rewrote a popular tutorial, increasing product quality.
Taught a rigorous networking certification course to over 20 professionals and rewrote three certification exams.
